categories: Category:Jedi affiliated with the Alliance to Restore the Republic
Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Diala Passil was a female Rutian Twi'lek and Jedi Padawan who survived Order 66 and the Jedi Purge. She survived into the Galactic Civil War and allied herself with the Alliance to Restore the Republic.

Diala Passil was a Jedi Padawan, apprenticed to a Jedi Master during the Clone Wars and final days of the Galactic Republic. Her master did not survive the execution of Order 66, though his teachings helped her to escape execution and survive the Jedi Purge. Passil adhered to her master's teachings and fought the Galactic Empire as part of the Rebel Alliance.
